holidays.title: Bonalu
holidays.description: Join in on Bonalu celebrations as devotees offer their prayers to the Hindu goddess Mahakali.

holidays.title: Central Province Day
holidays.description: To the residents of the Central Province, we wish you a happy Second Appointed Day anniversary!

holidays.title: Feast Day of Saints Peter and Paul
holidays.description: Let’s prepare to honor the martyrdom of St. Peter and St. Paul.

holidays.title: Internal Autonomy Day
holidays.description: Join the celebrations and learn the history of these French Polynesian islands in the south-central Pacific.

holidays.title: International Day of the Tropics
holidays.description: Today, let’s enjoy the beauty of the tropics and appreciate everything they have to offer.

holidays.title: International Fisherman Day
holidays.description: Get ready to read some amazing and thrilling facts about fishermen around the world.

holidays.title: International Mud Day
holidays.description: Get your old clothes ready to dive in some mud and celebrate International Mud Day!

holidays.title: Log Cabin Day
holidays.description: Take an imaginary or virtual trip to the forest and learn more about these historical homes.

holidays.title: National Almond Buttercrunch Day
holidays.description: Get to know more about almond buttercrunch and the fun you can have with it.

holidays.title: National Bacon Burnt End Day
holidays.description: Everyone loves crispy bacon but today, we're focusing on bacon-burned ends.

holidays.title: National Camera Day
holidays.description: Focus on how cameras have made telling our stories easier than ever.

holidays.title: National Dieselbilly Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate Bill Kirchen, the “Titan of the Telecaster,” on National Dieselbilly Day.

holidays.title: National Guy Day
holidays.description: Join us as we remember all the special Guys out there this National Guy Day!

holidays.title: National Waffle Iron Day
holidays.description: Explore this day to learn exciting new recipes for making waffles with a modern twist.

holidays.title: Outdoor Equipment Maintenance Day
holidays.description: Avoid costly repairs and wasting your time by servicing your outdoor equipment.

holidays.title: Saint Peter and Saint Paul Day (Chile)
holidays.description: It’s Saint Peter and Saint Paul Day. Learn more about these two revered Catholic saints.

holidays.title: San Francisco's Birthday
holidays.description: Celebrate the city renowned for its steep rolling hills, eclectic architecture, and iconic landmarks.

holidays.title: Seychelles Independence Day
holidays.description: Seychelles Independence Day is a commemoration of this nation reclaiming its freedom.

holidays.title: St Peter's Day
holidays.description: Get ready to partake in the special masses and festivities to mark St. Peter’s Day!

holidays.title: The Feast of Saints Peter and Paul
holidays.description: We celebrate this day as part of a solemn reminder of Christianity’s history.

holidays.title: Camila Mendes’s Birthday
holidays.description: It is just the beginning for this talented “Riverdale” actress, Camila Mendes.

holidays.title: Colin Jost’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this Ivy League writer and comedian, there is no telling what amazing character he will create next.

holidays.title: Jovanie’s Birthday
holidays.description: Jovanie is the pop-oriented R.&.B. vocalist and occasional rapper reminiscent of a young Chris Brown.

holidays.title: Kawhi Leonard’s Birthday
holidays.description: Kawhi Leonard is regarded as one of the best defenders in the N.B.A.

holidays.title: Matthew Mercer’s Birthday
holidays.description: Is there an anime or famous video game Mercer hasn’t worked on? We doubt it.

holidays.title: SSN Santa’s Birthday
holidays.description: He's the YouTube star with the most entertaining gaming content on the platform.

holidays.title: Suzette Quintanilla’s Birthday
holidays.description: This star had to deal with personal heartbreak after the death of her sister.
